#PART 1: reading tests
#load t_throttle into reg 4
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000000000
#load throttle
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000000001
#load t_angle
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000000010
#load angle
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000000011
#load tur_offset
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000000100
#load num_mines
00001 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1000000000100001


#PART 2: writing tests
#reg4 = 100
00000 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 0000000001100100
#write to t_throttle
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000000000

#write to t_angle
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000000010

01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0
01001 1 010 010 0 0 0 0

#reg4 = -100
00000 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 1111111110011100

#write to t_throttle
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000000000

#write to t_angle
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000000010

#write to fire_missile
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000010000

#write to drop_mine
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000100000


#reg4 = 1
00000 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 0000000000000001

#write to scan
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001000

#write to scan_arc
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001001

#write to scan_len
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001010



#reg4 = 90
00000 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 0000000001011010

#write to scan_arc
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001001

#write to scan_len
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001010



#reg4 = 256
00000 0 100 010 0 0 0 0 0000000100000000

#write to scan_arc
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001001

#write to scan_len
00010 0 010 100 0 0 0 0 1000000000001010
